item.title: A look back at housing's best year in a decade
item.description: THE YEAR IS DRAWING TO A CLOSE and by many measures 2016 was the best year for housing in a decade. Back in May I shared some trends on housing markets in a Tufte style document. Now that we have nearly a full year’s worth of data, let’s see how housing and mortgage markets did in 2016. Well, I’ve created a retrospective looking back at the full year. You can read it here.
